New Records: CJ McCollum tied a career-high with 50 points and tied an NBA record for 50 or more points and 10+ three-pointers in less than 35 minutes, joining Steph Curry and Klay Thompson
Key Match Events: CJ McCollum scored 50 points in just 30 minutes of play, leading the Pelicans to a 132-120 victory over the Wizards
Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans hoped CJ McCollum's pairing with Brandon Ingram and Zion Williamson would propel them into contention in the Western Conference
Post-Match Reflections: CJ McCollum reflected on his career night with the media, expressing his hard work and sacrifice for the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Smoothie King Center in New Orleans
Others: CJ McCollum admitted this season is not how he expected it to go due to constant injuries to Ingram and Williamson
